# [Interview #981: JordanCon 2013 - Q&A with Maria, Entry #38](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=981#38)

#### Terez

Was there ever a Black Amyrlin?

#### Marie Curie

That's not the way the Black liked to work usually...

#### Maria Simons

Yeah, I'm thinking not, but I don't know that.
